vlive.korean: [아주 정확하고 날카로운 추리] 그렇지? [A very accurate and sharp deduction] Right? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] "세븐틴의 2020 운수대통 신년카드③" (SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: [A very accurate and sharp deduction] Right?

vlive.korean: [더 날카로운 턱선에 와앙 베여서] - 근데 그게 좀... - 그때까지 생각을... [cut my heart... I'm bleeding now!] - That's... - But it's hard to... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ASTRO] 마피아가 누구든 잡혀가는 건 저예요.. 별둥이 보고 눈물 훔쳐서💦 (ASTRO playing the Mafia game)
vlive.english: [cut my heart... I'm bleeding now!] - That's... - But it's hard to...

vlive.korean: [승관평가단의 날카로운 질문] 기존 제품 걸 쓰시지 않으셨나요? [Judge SeungKwan's sharp question] Didn't you use a ready-made sauce? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉라면➀” (세븐틴 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: [Judge SeungKwan's sharp question] Didn't you use a ready-made sauce?

vlive.korean: 얘가 원래 이렇게 날카로운 애니? Is he always such a sharp kids? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 30대 남자들끼리 술 마시면 하는 얘기 "결혼VS비혼" <김준현의짠> 2회
vlive.english: Is he always such a sharp kids?

vlive.korean: [나름 근거 있는 항목을 위주로 날카로운 추리 중] 악당의 소리를 잘 들어야 해 청력! You need to enemy sounds well! Hearing! 듣기 View video ATEEZ : ATEEZ(에이티즈) WANTED 2화

examples.korean: shrill demands / protests 발음듣기 소리 높이 외치는[날카로운] 요구/항의 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
a work full of savage/biting satire 발음듣기 신랄한[날카로운] 풍자로 가득한 작품 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a work full of savage/biting satire 발음

examples.korean: The animal is covered in long piercing spines. 발음듣기 그 동물은 길고 날카로운 가시들로 뒤덮여 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The animal is covered in long piercing spines. 발음

examples.korean: He hit him with two sharp lefts. 발음듣기 그가 그에게 날카로운 레프트를 두 대 먹였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He hit him with two sharp lefts. 발음

examples.korean: She looked at me with piercing blue eyes. 발음듣기 그녀는 날카로운 푸른 눈으로 나를 바라보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She looked at me with piercing blue eyes. 발음
